# seqera_orgs (Data Source)

Orgs DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "seqera_orgs" "my_orgs" {
  role = "...my_role..."
}
```

## Schema

- `role` (String) Organization user role identifier

### Read-Only

- `organizations` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--organizations))
